metadata.Title: CVE-2021-29495 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: Nim is a statically typed compiled systems programming language. In Nim standard library before 1.4.2, httpClient SSL/TLS certificate verification was disabled by default. Users can upgrade to version 1.4.2 to receive a patch or, as a workaround, set "verifyMode = CVerifyPeer" as documented.

criterions.comment: nim package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
